onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: Your personal sous-chef. I'll help you plan your weekly meals in a simple and delicious way.
onboarding.dietSubtitle: Tell me your eating style so I know what to suggest
onboarding.preferencesSubtitle: Customize your meals just the way you like
onboarding.mealsTitle: How many meals do you want to plan?
onboarding.mealsSubtitle: Choose how many meals per week you'd like me to suggest
onboarding.calendarSubtitle: So I can suggest quick recipes when you're short on time
onboarding.completeSubtitle: I've got everything I need. Let's get cooking!

dashboard.whatToday: What do you feel like today?
dashboard.basedOnYesterday: You had {{meal}} yesterday, let's switch it up!
dashboard.noFridge: Your fridge is empty! Add some ingredients to get started
dashboard.greetingMorning: Good morning {{name}}! What shall we make?
dashboard.souschefTip1: A balanced meal keeps your energy up all afternoon!
dashboard.souschefTip2: Try switching up your protein sources throughout the week.
dashboard.souschefTip3: Remember to update your fridge when you buy groceries!
dashboard.souschefTip4: Legumes are a great protein source, even for meat eaters.
dashboard.yesterdayAte: You had {{meal}} yesterday — let's switch it up!
dashboard.goShoppingSubtitle: Available recipes need ingredients you don't have. Update your fridge or visit the supermarket!

fridge.title: Your fridge
fridge.subtitle: Tell me what you have and I'll tell you what to cook
fridge.noNewItems: No new ingredients — your fridge is up to date
fridge.empty: Your fridge is empty! Start adding ingredients

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.noFavorites: You haven't saved any favorite recipes yet

history.title: Your meals
history.subtitle: Here's what you've eaten recently
history.noMeals: No meals logged yet. Let's start cooking!
history.removeConfirmText: The meal will be removed from the calendar.

feedback.title: How was it?
feedback.subtitle: Your feedback helps me get to know you better
feedback.commentPlaceholder: E.g. Too salty, perfect portion, would make again...
feedback.thankYou: Thanks! I'll keep that in mind for future suggestions

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure? All your data will be permanently deleted.
settings.comingSoon: Coming soon! We're working on it
settings.macroInfoSubtitle: Learn how Rucola balances your meals
settings.macroBaseDesc: The energetic base of the dish. Provides complex carbohydrates for lasting energy.
settings.macroBaseExamples: E.g. pasta, rice, bread, couscous, quinoa, potatoes, farro, barley, polenta
settings.macroProteinDesc: Essential for muscles and satiety. Every meal should have a protein source.
settings.macroProteinExamples: E.g. chicken, fish, eggs, legumes, tofu, cheese, seitan, tempeh
settings.macroVegetableDesc: Vitamins, minerals, and fiber. They make the dish complete and colorful!
settings.macroVegetableExamples: E.g. zucchini, tomatoes, spinach, peppers, broccoli, carrots, eggplant

shopping.mapsHint: Opens Google Maps with supermarkets near you

calendar.confirmSubtitle: Choose if it's for lunch or dinner

errors.fridgeSaveFailed: Couldn't save fridge. Please try again.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

pageInfo.dashboard: Here you'll find your personal sous-chef's suggestions! I suggest balanced recipes based on what's in your fridge and your preferences.
pageInfo.fridge: Add the ingredients you have at home. Type the name or pick from the list — I'll use them to suggest the best recipes!
pageInfo.history: Your meal diary! Tap a day to see what you cooked. It helps you vary your meals and keep track of what you've eaten.
pageInfo.settings: Manage your profile, change language, edit dietary preferences, or leave feedback to help improve the app.
